content: The second hit can be extremely tough to dodge, but using the Pillar Stance to get off the ground can soak the blow if you have stamina to spare (though it will probably still stun you).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Fight - Chen Loong'.
The content is as follows:
The second hit can be extremely tough to dodge, but using the Pillar Stance to get off the ground can soak the blow if you have stamina to spare (though it will probably still stun you).
